name: The Legend of Greenheart
description:
Rise Warriors! It's time to save your queen from the hands of the evil KING PIG!

Based on the Kings and Pigs Asset Pack (https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs), this short platformer was done mainly as a learning project. 

There are 3 levels, a final boss and two difficulty levels, Easy and Normal (even though I admit Normal can be a little too hard...). You start the game with basic skills and can improve them with the diamonds you collect along the way. There are also bugs! I believe there's nothing game breaking but any feedback is appreciated! I hope you enjoy :)

(The game was tested in screen resolutions ranging from 1366x768 to 1920x1080. Though not unplayable in resolutions out of this range, you may experience some visual glitches)
